# surf

## Installation

You can install the development version of *surf* from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JoleneSutton/surf")
```

## Introduction

The [Introduction vignette](https://jolenesutton.github.io/surf/articles/introduction.html) provides an overview of functions and their examples.
